text: The Weinstein Company ’ s “ Amityville : The Awakening ” grossed a minuscule $ 742 total at 10 locations on Saturday, two weeks after the haunted house sequel began streaming for free on Google Play. Bella Thorne, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Jennifer Morrison, and Cameron Monaghan star in “ Amityville : The Awakening, ” which was directed by Franck Khalfoun from his own script. It ’ s produced by TWC ’ s Dimension and Blumhouse. The original 1979 movie “ The Amityville Horror ” is based on the 1974 events at a rural house in Amityville, N.
